property.name: hive.server2.enable.impersonation
property.description: Set this property to enable impersonation in Hive Server 2

property.name: hive.server2.enable.doAs
property.description: Set this property to enable impersonation in Hive Server 2

property.name: hive.execution.engine
property.description: Chooses execution engine. Options are: mr(default), tez, or spark

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification
property.description: Modify schema instead of reporting error
